Sentencas: Tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cells (SIS-SOFCs) offer the advantages of high voltage, low current, easy sealing, and high thermal shock resistance.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of air flow characteristics for a compact 5 x 10 array tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Tubular SIS-SOFCs can be assembled into a highly integrated power-generation stack module to increase the volumetric power density.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of air flow characteristics for a compact 5 x 10 array tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: This study investigated the air flow characteristics of a kilowatt-class tubular SIS-SOFC stack with a 5 x 10-cell array, each containing 59 segments.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of air flow characteristics for a compact 5 x 10 array tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: A three-dimensional stack model that considers practical stack structures, coupled electrochemical reactions, and the mass/momentum/heat transfer processes was developed.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of air flow characteristics for a compact 5 x 10 array tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The results show that a large flow nonuniformity existed in the conventional tubular stack design, which resulted in a severe temperature distribution.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of air flow characteristics for a compact 5 x 10 array tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Local hot spots at the marginal positions and circumferential temperature difference were found to be non-negligible.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of air flow characteristics for a compact 5 x 10 array tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: To improve the flow uniformity, an air distributor with optimized diameters at different positions was designed, and manifold parameters were adjusted to balance the flow resistance.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of air flow characteristics for a compact 5 x 10 array tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The maximum temperature was reduced by 35 K and temperature uniformity was significantly improved.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of air flow characteristics for a compact 5 x 10 array tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack
